entry.title: Saturday: Periods of snow. High minus 15.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending this morning then mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Local amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 15. Wind chill minus 28 this morning and minus 19 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Saturday 11 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 29.
